name: Espresso
title: Short and strong coffee
description: Espresso is a concentrated form of coffee that is brewed by forcing hot water under high pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
title: Coffee with steamed milk
description: Latte is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. It is typically topped with a layer of milk foam.

name: Cappuccino
title: Coffee with equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam
description: Cappuccino is a coffee drink that is made with equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It is typically served in a small cup.

name: Americano
title: Espresso diluted with hot water
description: Americano is a coffee drink made by diluting an espresso shot with hot water. It is similar to drip coffee but has a different taste due to the use of espresso as a base.

name: Mocha
title: Espresso with chocolate syrup and steamed milk
description: Mocha is a coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate syrup, and steamed milk. It is typically topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Macchiato
title: Espresso with a dollop of steamed milk
description: Macchiato is a coffee drink made with a shot of espresso and a dollop of steamed milk. It is similar to a latte, but with a stronger coffee flavor.

name: Iced Coffee
title: Chilled coffee served over ice
description: Iced coffee is a coffee drink that is served chilled over ice. It can be made with regular drip coffee or espresso, and is typically sweetened with sugar or a flavored syrup.

name: Affogato
title: Espresso poured over a scoop of ice cream
description: Affogato is a dessert coffee made with a shot of espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream. It is typically served in a small bowl or glass.

name: Flat White
title: Coffee with a double shot of espresso and steamed milk
description: Flat white is a coffee drink made with a double shot of espresso and steamed milk. It is similar to a latte, but with a stronger coffee flavor and less milk foam.

name: Turkish Coffee
title: Strong coffee brewed in a pot and served unfiltered
description: Turkish coffee is a coffee drink that is brewed in a pot and served unfiltered. It is a stronger coffee flavor
